name: Zepto
headline: 10-Minute Grocery Delivery in India
description:
We deliver groceries in 10 minutes through a network of optimized micro-warehouses or 'dark stores' that we build across cities in India.

We're currently doing hundreds of millions of dollars in annual sales with best-in-class unit economics - come join us!
generated_description:
### Zepto: Redefining Grocery Delivery in India

**Founded**: 2020  
**Headquarters**: India  
**Employees**: 1,300  
**Annual Sales**: Hundreds of millions of dollars  
**Backing**: Y Combinator (Batch W21)  
**Mission**: Delivering groceries in just 10 minutes  

**Overview**:  
Zepto is an innovative grocery delivery service based out of India, aimed at providing a swift and efficient shopping experience. Their premise is simple: get your essentials delivered in just 10 minutes. This is made possible through a network of strategically located micro-warehouses, known as "dark stores," that facilitate rapid fulfillment and minimize delivery times. 

**Operational Efficiency**:  
Zepto boasts best-in-class unit economics, which means they not only prioritize speed but also ensure profitability in their operations. This makes them an attractive prospect for potential employees and investors alike, especially in a market where delivery speed is increasingly becoming a differentiator. 

**Product Offering**:  
Their website showcases a wide array of products, spanning over 7,000 items across categories including groceries, fresh produce, personal care, and household essentials. You can find everything from fresh fruits and vegetables to snacks, beverages, and even beauty products. In addition, Zepto offers exciting discounts on various items, adding to the appeal of shopping with them.

**Vision for the Future**:  
Zepto aims to scale its presence across more cities in India, enhancing its delivery network to reach an even larger customer base. They’re looking for talented individuals to join their team as they elevate grocery shopping into a fast-paced, tech-driven experience.

For more information and to explore their offerings, you can visit [Zepto's website](https://www.zeptonow.com).
